scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.ppostbuild: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
